channel.title: Exstasy
channel.description: This is my first time doing exstasy, I took 2 pills about 5 minutes ago and I just want to know how long until it affects me? I also smoked about 2g of weed out of a waterfall. Will the weed slow down my effect to exstasy?

item.title: Exstasy
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

There’s very little advise anyone can give to you, other then harm reduction. Because every pill varies so much. It’s incredibly difficult to find a pill containing mdma only.

Please read all the articles on the left hand side menu. http://thedea.org/statistics.html

You said it was a good time. But don’t judge it all based on that roll. It should have been incredible if it was good stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Exstasy
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:8, topic:361285”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=457570.msg3348980#msg3348980 date=1285100592]

enjoy it, although if you can, try and get hold of MDMA because the buzz is way better. Drink water, maybe grab a cup of tea when your peaking, sit back, and relax.

Thanks Chris, it was a good night

Topic can be locked now, i had my answer and had a good night.
[/quote]
Do tell us more![/quote]

He did things he never wants to talk about again… EVER.

Read full topic
